pageContent: Objectives: Intraoperative nerve stimulation has been used to map the course of cavernosal nerve bundles to aid in nerve-sparing radical prostatectomy (RP). We sought to determine whether the intraoperative nerve stimulation response after removal of the prostate specimen predicts postoperative potency.

metaData.source:
Psoas muscle volume is correlated with sexual activity and erectile dysfunction among patients with localised prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31230398/
